snippet.title: Streets of Rogue 2 - Official Reveal Trailer | gamescom 2023
snippet.description:
Streets of Rogue 2 gameplay is finally here! Fight, sneak, hack, farm, build, steal, or talk your way to power as you try to topple a corrupt president—solo or with friends.

Streets of Rogue 2 is a crazy, immersive RPG sandbox set in a randomly generated open world. A much-anticipated sequel to an award-winning 2019 indie darling that sold more than one million copies, this title will dial the craziness to eleven in 2024.
